content: KVM is easier. For more information about KVM support, see the IBM Z website. 7.3 IBM z16 features and function support overview The following tables list the IBM z16 features and functions and their minimum required operating system support levels:  Table 7-3 on page 253  Table 7-4 on page 254  Table 7-5 on page 256  Table 7-6 on page 257  Table 7-7 on page 258  Table 7-8 on page 259  Table 7-9 on page 261  Table 7-10 on page 263  Table 7-11 on page 264 Information about Linux on IBM Z refers exclusively to the suitable distributions of SUSE, Red Hat, and Ubuntu. The tables in this section list but do not specifically mark all the features that require fixes that are required by the corresponding operating system for toleration or use. All tables use the following conventions:  Y: The function is supported.  N: The function is not supported.  - : The function is not applicable to that specific operating system. c. Maintenance is required. d. For more information about
